Posted By: EnV (3/11/2010 7:51:52 AM)

posts.post_content: Bought a playset as soon as I could. The great thing about it is its 5 power for a cost of ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol). That's a fourth of your opponent's life, on top of a great hate ability. In an all-artifact deck, it's hard to find a more economical beater. And yes, it can be Bolted. Lots of things can be Bolted. Every card has vulnerabilities; I don't think the fact that Lightning Bolt kills this card completely invalidates it.
posts.html:

In an all-artifact deck, it's hard to find a more economical beater. And yes, it can be Bolted. Lots of things can be Bolted.
